snippet: Gunmen attacked a truck carrying Kenyan soldiers near the border with Somalia on Thursday, seriously wounding three of them, the police said.
abstract: Police in Kenya say gunmen seriously wounded three Kenyan soldiers after attacking their truck near Somalia border; assault bears hallmarks of Shabab group.
lead_paragraph: Gunmen attacked a truck carrying Kenyan soldiers near the border with Somalia on Thursday, seriously wounding three of them, the police said.
